trans-unit.source: A data-bound list control that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結清單控制項，允許自訂版面配置，方法是在清單中為所顯示的每個項目重複指定的範本。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Data Binding](#data_binding)
trans-unit.target: [資料繫結](#data_binding)

trans-unit.source: [Templates](#templates)
trans-unit.target: [範本](#templates)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is a basic templated data-bound list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項是基本的樣板化資料繫結清單。

trans-unit.source: It has no built-in layout or styles, so you must explicitly declare all layout, formatting, and style tags within the control's templates.
trans-unit.target: 它有沒有內建的配置或樣式，因此您必須明確宣告所有版面配置、 格式化和樣式標記內控制項的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control allows you to split markup tags across the templates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項可讓您在範本之間分割標記。

trans-unit.source:
To create a table using templates, include the begin table tag (``) in the , a single table row tag (``) in the , and the end table tag (`
`) in the .
trans-unit.target:
若要建立資料表，使用範本，包括的開始資料表標記 (``) 中，單一資料表資料列標記 (``) 中，和資料表結尾標記 (`
`) 中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control has no built-in selection capabilities or editing support.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項沒有任何內建的選取功能或編輯的支援。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand> event to process control events that are raised from the templates to the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand>程序由範本產生至控制項的控制項事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: Data Binding
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項提供兩個屬性，以支援資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or an array), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source.
trans-unit.target: 若要將資料繫結至任何實作的集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面 (例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>、 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或陣列)，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>介面，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性來指定資料來源。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性，您必須手動撰寫的程式碼來執行資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control to a data source represented by a data source control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: 自動繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>代表資料來源控制項，資料來源的控制項設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>資料來源使用的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control automatically binds to the specified data source control on the first request.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項第一次要求。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method unless you have changed data-related properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不需要明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法除非您已變更的資料相關的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control binds its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> to either the data model declared and referenced by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property or the data source control specified by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制繫結其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>任一個資料模型宣告和參考其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性或資料來源所指定的控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A> are not data-bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A>無法資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control's data source is set but no data is returned, the control renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A> with no items.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>設定控制項的資料來源，但未傳回任何資料時，控制項呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>與任何項目。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is `null`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源是`null`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>就不會轉譯。

trans-unit.source: Templates
trans-unit.target: 範本

trans-unit.source: At a minimum, every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control must define an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 至少每隔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項必須定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, other optional templates described in the following table can be used to customize the appearance of the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過下, 表說明其他選擇性範本可以用來自訂外觀的清單。

trans-unit.source: Template name
trans-unit.target: 範本名稱

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Defines the content and layout of items within the list.
trans-unit.target: 定義的內容和配置的清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This template is required.
trans-unit.target: 此範本為必要項。

trans-unit.source: If defined, determines the content and layout of alternating (zero-based odd-indexed) items.
trans-unit.target: 如果有定義，決定的內容和替代的配置 （以零為起始奇數索引） 的項目。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>用。

trans-unit.source: If defined, is rendered between items (and alternating items).
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，則會呈現項目 （與替代項目） 之間。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a separator is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，就不會轉譯為分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: If defined, determines the content and layout of the list header.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，判斷內容和清單標頭的配置。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a header is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，就不會轉譯標頭。

trans-unit.source: If defined, determines the content and layout of the list footer.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，判斷內容和清單頁尾的配置。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a footer is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，就不會轉譯的頁尾。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192873).
trans-unit.target: 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192873)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use two simple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用兩個簡單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property is used to specify the data source for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性用來指定資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> displays its items in a table; the second <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> displays its items in a comma-separated list.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>資料表中會顯示其項目，第二個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>以逗號分隔的清單會顯示其項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property to specify the data source for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，以指定的資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control used to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項用來擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: When the page is loaded, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control automatically binds to the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and the data is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 載入頁面時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項自動繫結至指定之資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項和資料顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object implementing <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that defines how alternating items in the control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 的物件，其定義如何顯示控制項中的替代項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that defines how alternating items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 定義替代項目顯示方式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a different appearance for alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from what is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來提供不同的外觀中替代項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制從項目中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> to display alternating items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control in a light blue cell with bold font.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>要顯示的替代項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>粗體字淺藍色儲存格的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when data methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 正在呼叫資料方法時發生。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to specify that the data methods to be called are on a different object than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的目的是要讓您有機會指定所要呼叫資料方法位於不同的物件，而非<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> that contains the child controls of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> that contains the child controls of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Controls%2A> collection to manage the child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Controls%2A>集合來管理子控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is commonly used to retrieve a child control from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用於擷取集合中的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also add and remove child controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入和移除集合中的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: To access a child control within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> for a given index.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取子控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項，逐一查看<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A>要擷取集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>給定索引。

trans-unit.source: Then call the **Repeater** item's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method to retrieve a control with a particular ID.
trans-unit.target: 然後呼叫**中繼器**的繼承項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法來擷取具有特定識別碼的控制項

trans-unit.source: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫，通知使用組合實作的伺服器控制項來建立所包含的任何子控制項，以準備回傳或呈現。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to use the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否使用指定的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Creates a control hierarchy, with or without the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用或不使用指定的資料來源建立控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The first call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SelectArguments%2A> property calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SelectArguments%2A>屬性呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified location within the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control to place the created item.
trans-unit.target: 要放置建立項目之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項內的指定位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> that represents the specified type of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> item to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" />，表示要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 項目的指定類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> object with the specified item type and location within the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> 控制項內的指定項目類型和位置，建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateItem%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> and corresponding index and type in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateItem%2A>自訂的伺服器中的方法控制，好讓它永遠都會傳回新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>，對應的索引，在自訂中的類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> object is being created.
trans-unit.target: 正在建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> 物件時發生。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance in scenarios where you want to use a custom class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的目的是要讓您有機會變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>在案例中您要使用衍生自的自訂類別的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>類別。

trans-unit.source: Binds the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control and all its child controls to the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項和它的所有子控制項繫結至指定的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>方法所指定的資料來源繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you bind a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, the information in the data source is displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當您繫結至資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項，資料來源中的資訊會顯示在控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法也常用於同步處理資料來源和資料更新資料來源中的資訊之後，清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓資料清單控制項中也會更新資料來源中的任何變更。

trans-unit.source: If the data source for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項由指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，您不需要明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 呼叫這個方法會自動將繫結至指定的資料來源控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always raises a data binding event in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>自訂的伺服器中的方法控制，好讓它一定會引發自訂的資料繫結事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific table in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> 中要繫結至控制項的特定表格。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies a table in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，其指定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> 中的表格。

trans-unit.source: If the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性包含多個資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的特定來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有<xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType>多個資料表，您必須指定要繫結至控制項的表格。

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: 您已指定資料來源之後，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>資料來源繫結至控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A> property to specify a table in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>屬性，以指定的資料表中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that provides data for populating the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提供資料以填入 (Populate) 清單的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> object that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> 物件，包含用於提供資料給這個控制項的值集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the source of data to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定要填入的資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> can be any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType> for accessing databases, a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or an array, or an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>可以是任何<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合，例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>來存取資料庫， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或陣列，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>物件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property you must manually write the code to bind to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性必須以手動方式撰寫程式碼繫結至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: If the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性包含多個資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的特定來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有<xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType>多個資料表，您必須指定要繫結至控制項的表格。

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: 您已指定資料來源之後，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>資料來源繫結至控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>自動繫結到資料來源控制項所代表的資料來源的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method unless you dynamically change properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>方法除非您以動態方式變更的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=nameWithType> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，ASP.NET 會不能夠解析資料來源和<xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control when the page is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制當載入的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> object specified is not a supported source of data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> 物件不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項支援的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 無法解析資料來源，因為同時為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> 屬性和 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> 屬性指定了值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property of the data source control that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 屬性，而 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項應該用這個控制項來擷取其資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ID" /> property of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項的 <see langword="ID" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>資料來源屬性控制的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項應擷取其資料來源使用。

trans-unit.source: The data source control that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property can be any control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源所參考的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性可以是實作任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>介面。

trans-unit.source: The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control that references it or in a parent control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項必須有兩種做為相同的命名容器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>參考它的控制項或中的父控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property to specify the source of values to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至值的來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data source must be a collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (such as the <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType> object) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源必須是集合中實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面 (例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件) 或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property, you must write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>屬性，您必須撰寫程式碼以執行資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> properties, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，ASP.NET 不能解析資料來源和<xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=nameWithType>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the page is loaded, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control binds to the data source that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and the data is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 載入頁面時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項繫結至資料來源所指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項和資料顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved for one of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: 由於下列其中一項原因，無法解析資料來源：

trans-unit.source: A value is specified for both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 同時為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> 屬性指定了值。

trans-unit.source: The data source specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> property cannot be found on the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面上找不到由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> 屬性指定的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The data source specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> property does not implement <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> 屬性所指定的資料來源不會實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes are applied to this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出主題是否套用至此控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use themes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用主題，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.EnableTheming%2A> property indicates whether themes are enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.EnableTheming%2A>屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.EnableTheming%2A> property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.EnableTheming%2A>屬性是`true`，要套用的控制項面板中搜尋應用程式的佈景主題目錄。

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的控制項面板佈景主題目錄中，不會套用面板。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 方法之前，請先確認 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind" /> 控制項是否需要資料繫結，而且是否已指定有效的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，ASP.NET 會自動將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>至指定的資料來源控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, it first calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.EnsureDataBound%2A> method to verify that the control has not already been data bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當 ASP.NET 會執行資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項，它會先呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.EnsureDataBound%2A>方法以驗證控制項尚未繫結的資料，並控制的有效資料來源，實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>指定介面其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.EnsureDataBound%2A> method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.EnsureDataBound%2A>方法接著呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that defines how the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，其定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項頁尾區段的顯示方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that defines how the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項頁尾區段顯示方式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to create a template that controls how the footer section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來建立範本，可控制如何的頁尾區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the control has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否已初始化控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the control has been initialized, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已初始化控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Initialized%2A> property is a helper property that is used to determine whether data binding is required when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Initialized%2A>屬性是用來判斷資料繫結是否需要時的協助程式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: The control to be initialized from an inline template.
trans-unit.target: 要從內嵌 (Inline) 樣板初始化的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Populates iteratively the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> with a sub-hierarchy of child controls.
trans-unit.target: 以子控制項的子階層架構重複填入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> property is set to a value other than an empty string (""); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID" /> 屬性設為空字串 ("") 以外的值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.IsBoundUsingDataSourceID%2A> property is a helper property that determines whether the control is bound to an ASP.NET 2.0 data source control, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.IsBoundUsingDataSourceID%2A>屬性是協助程式屬性，可決定是否在控制項繫結至 ASP.NET 2.0 資料來源控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether data binding is automatic.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料繫結是否為自動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data binding is automatic; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料繫結是自動的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Data binding is automatic if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is bound to a data source control or if model binders are in use.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結為自動如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項是繫結至資料來源控制項或模型繫結器是否已在使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button is clicked in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when a button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 中的按鈕時，會引發這個事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This event causes a round-trip from the client to occur.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會導致從用戶端往返。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Information about the button is displayed when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is clicked.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> 控制項中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection by enumerating every object in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A>列舉中的每個物件的集合及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection is then used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control to render each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A>集合接著會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項呈現在控制項中的每個項目。

trans-unit.target: 如果您設定此屬性，並使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SelectMethod%2A>屬性選取方法所傳回的類型必須是這個屬性所指定的型別，或必須能夠轉換成這個屬性所指定的型別。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property automatically enables Dynamic Data functionality.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會自動啟用動態資料功能。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved using the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 還原先前使用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SaveViewState" /> 方法所儲存的上一個網頁要求中的檢視-狀態資訊。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand" /> event if the <paramref name="EventArgs" /> parameter is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="EventArgs" /> 參數為 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand" /> 的執行個體，則會引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand" /> was raised, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果引發了 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataBinding%2A> method in a custom server control so that if the event argument is a command type, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control always calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnItemCommand%2A> and bubbles up the event, or returns `false` and cancels the event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataBinding%2A>方法，因此，如果事件引數是自訂的伺服器控制項中命令類型，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制一律呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnItemCommand%2A>和事件反昇或傳回`false`並取消事件。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> object that is being created.
trans-unit.target: 提供對所建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> 物件之存取的物件。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreatingModelDataSource" /> 事件。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see langword="DataBinding" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples demonstrate how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataBinding%2A> method in a custom server control so that if the event argument is a command type, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control always calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnItemCommand%2A> and bubbles up the event, or returns `false` and cancels the event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataBinding%2A>方法，因此，如果事件引數是自訂的伺服器控制項中命令類型，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制一律呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnItemCommand%2A>和事件反昇或傳回`false`並取消事件。

trans-unit.target: 判斷是否需要資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataPropertyChanged" /> is called during the data-binding phase of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataPropertyChanged" /> 會在控制項的資料繫結階段呼叫。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemDataBound>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data is modified after it is bound to an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control but before it is rendered on the page.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結中的項目之後修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>的控制項，但是之前在頁面上轉譯。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> event and performs other initialization.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> 事件或執行其他初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnLoad%2A> method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control that it should perform actions that are common to each HTTP request for the page that it is associated with, such as setting up a database query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnLoad%2A>方法會通知<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制它應執行常見之頁面相關聯，例如設定資料庫查詢的每個 HTTP 要求的動作。

trans-unit.source: At this stage in the page life cycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized, view state is restored, and form controls reflect client-side data.
trans-unit.target: 在這個階段中網頁的生命週期中，將伺服器控制項階層架構中的會建立並初始化、 還原檢視狀態，和表單控制項反映用戶端資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs" /> object contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs" /> 物件，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event is used to perform any updates before the output for the server control is rendered to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件可用來執行任何更新之前輸出至頁面呈現伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any changes in the view state of the server control can be saved during this event.
trans-unit.target: 在此事件期間，可以儲存伺服器控制項的檢視狀態中的任何變更。

trans-unit.source: Such changes made in the rendering phase are not saved.
trans-unit.target: 這類在轉譯階段所做的變更不會儲存。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control needs to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項是否需要繫結至其指定的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項需要繫結至資料來源則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性，以判斷控制項是否需要呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>繫結至其指定的資料來源的方法。

trans-unit.source: Each time the set accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫 set 存取子時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>屬性來變更資料來源之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnInit%2A>呼叫方法、 ASP.NET 設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`true`.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性也會設為`true`時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`false`之後立即<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自從網頁回傳至伺服器以來所發生的任何檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: The control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 控制項目前檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 物件，當從資料來源控制項擷取資料時 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 控制項會使用它。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object used to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: 用於擷取資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The first call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to call in order to read data.
trans-unit.target: 為了讀取資料要呼叫的方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data binding method.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會導致要做為資料繫結方式的模型繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> interface that defines how the separator between items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 介面，其會定義項目間分隔符號的顯示方式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that defines how the separator between items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，其定義項目間分隔符號的顯示方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A> property to create a template that controls how the separator between items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性來建立範本，可控制如何顯示項目之間的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A> property to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a template to control how separators between items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立範本，以便控制如何顯示項目之間的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the control so they can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 導致對控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件。
